name: Enhanced PeerTube
description: An improved PeerTube plugin supporting multiple instances with diverse content discovery
author: Enhanced by AI Assistant due to this not being worth my time

settings.name: Primary Instance URL
settings.description: The main PeerTube instance to use (without https://)

settings.name: Additional Instances
settings.description: Comma-separated list of additional PeerTube instances (without https://)

settings.name: Enable Random Instances
settings.description: Discover and use random PeerTube instances from the public list
